1: Save me, O God, by Your name, And [c]vindicate me by Your power.
2: Hear my prayer, O God; Give ear to the words of my mouth.
3: For strangers have risen against me And violent men have sought my [d]life; They have not set God before them. [e]Selah.
4: Behold, God is my helper; The Lord is [f]the sustainer of my soul.
5: [g]He will recompense the evil to [h]my foes; [i]Destroy them in Your [j]faithfulness.
6: [k]Willingly I will sacrifice to You; I will give thanks to Your name, O Lord, for it is good.
7: For [l]He has delivered me from all [m]trouble, And my eye has looked with satisfaction upon my enemies.
